abstracts.cdata!:
Ratings for the Third Partnership for
            Polio Eradication Project for Pakistan were as follows:
            outcomes were moderately unsatisfactory, risk to development
            outcome was substantial, Bank performance was moderately
            satisfactory, and Borrower performance was moderately
            unsatisfactory. Some lessons learned included: Simple design
            of project. Utilizing existing program management.
            International Development Association (IDA) buy-down
            mechanism. Polio eradication versus effective control and
            routine immunization. Awareness and ability to respond to
            changing environment.
